basic.description: Each student investigates a problem in geological engineering that is not covered in any of the available courses, and submits a written report on the topic. This course is open to students only if a suitable faculty member is available. (0/36/0/0/0)
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Problems In Engr. Geology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Must be registered in a BSCE program.
